name: Sébastien Loeb
introduction: Sbastien Loeb (LOWB; born 26 February 1974 in Haguenau,  is a French racing driver who tested a Renault Formula One car in December 2007, and then tested a Red Bull in 2008.  He was expected to drive for ToroRosso in late 2009 and 2010, but failed to obtain an FIA Super Licence and did not race.
